author: carolem8
title: needs tweeking
review:
I thought I was paying for a set that had bricks especially for me, but that is not the case, the bricks are pre-packed and come out with a tool and the board in a sealed box, the bricks are packed in 5 smaller boxes showing what colours are contain in them. The only guide is the picture, which is what you are really paying the £99.99 for.  The picture comes out separately and an assistant opens the box to put the photo in it for you.

The real downsize is you cant have pictures taken with say your partner or your child, also i think an numbered axis along all sized would be very helpful. You only get 3 attempts at what picture you want, which no one advises you of, also a mirror so you can check what you look like before you enter is a good idea.

Overall I was disappointed but the finished item is for a present for my sister in Australia, and I am sure she will like it, but it would have been a whole lot better if my husband and I could have had one done together.
